reviews.text: Let me undline the hotel is clean and at least mainly comfortable. But the lobby staff are curt, even rude.
reviews.title: Clean hotel, terrible service

reviews.text: This is an airport area hotel wbut does not have any transport. Walk to the air train, about 8 blocks, for 5 dollars in each direction, but safe enough an area. No effort to understand visitors or assist. Try the Super 8 1 block east, a far better hotel.
reviews.title: Good Nights Sleep

reviews.text: Reasonably priced hotel with very easy access to Manhattan and JFK. I arrived 4 hours before my checkin time and the very friendly staff allowed me to check in early at no extra charge. The rooms are small but very neat and clean. I was happy to see that I had a refridgrator in my room and access to a Microwave. Not located in the best neighborhood but you will save money on Taxi's because of it's location.
reviews.title: Did not have a problem...

reviews.text: It's my first time in NYC so I can't really compare this hotel to any hotels in the area but if I am going to compare it to the other hotel I've stayed at I would say it did not meet my standards. We stayed in this hotel for 2 nights.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, but the neighbourhood...

reviews.text: LOCATION - is very close from the aiport (LaGuardia) and subway (E line) Fastfood very close to the location. I was a little concern about our safety during our stay, the place looks a little run down. It could just be the look of the area, I did not notice any scary or susficious incident during our stay or we can be just lucky at that time.
reviews.title: Bad location, nice rooms

reviews.text: Very very small rooms!! The staff speaks in their own India language in front of clients. Actually witnessed another staff chastising them. That should be done in private!! The elevator moved so slow and it was disgusting inside!! When I didn't have my luggage I used the stairs.
reviews.title: SUCKS!!!

reviews.text: The walls were thin.... Could hear the neighbors fight. I would never recommend this hotel to anyone!!!
reviews.title: Perfect

reviews.text: Perfect place if you want to spend less than 100USD for night (yeah, I found this rate on their website!) and not in a creepy place. Sure, you're not in Central Park, but if you're a big boy you can get there in 25 minutes with the subway, just around the corner.
reviews.title: great rate.... great place
Unwilling to help
reviews.text: Flat tv, faboulous bed+pillow and a ready to help staff made my 3 days there perfect.
Close to the JFK and to Jamaica Medical Centre.
reviews.title: Adjacent to Jamaica Medical Center

reviews.text: I was subjected to a flight cancellation at JFK due to thunderstorms that came through the area and could not be rebooked until the next day. Choices for a hotel room were almost non-existent and it started to look as if I might have to sleep in the terminal, when my travel agent said they booked the last room available at the Clarion in Jamaica, Queens. I was relieved to have anyplace to lie my head after a nine hour flight from Europe, but when my taxi pulled up in front of the Clarion, I didn't even recognize it as a hotel.
reviews.title: Any Port in a Storm

reviews.text: My room truly was the last one in the house, but it resembled more of a sleazy love nest than any place I really wanted to stay. It had a king-sized bed with a four person jacuzzi tub right next to it, and the rest of the room was a dump. The bathroom was quite small and unimpressive, but looked at least moderately clearn. The worst part, though, was that my shoes were actually sticking to the carpet as I walked to the desk area. To be fair, the wireless internet was free and adequate, so at least I was able to get a little work done before bed.
reviews.title: Close to Subway... Great Value

reviews.text: The surrounding neighborhood looked daunting, so I didn't take any chances on going out in search of a dinner venue. The hotel did have a directory of area restaurants that would deliver to the hotel, so I settled on an expensive and overly large pizza. I asked the front desk to call me a taxi the next morning for the return trip to JFK, but they instead offered a car service for a "$25 flat rate", almost twice what I paid for the yellow taxi to the hotel the day before. To make it worse, the drive of the car service ripped me off for $30, but I can't blame that on the hotel.
reviews.title: Convenient and cheaper than the alternatives.

reviews.text: Difficult travel conditions make for difficult choices, but at least I didn't have to sleep in a chair at JFK. Except for another an emergency, I won't be staying at the Clarion in Jamaica again.
reviews.title: Nightmare!!!

reviews.text: This was my 2nd stay at hotel...
reviews.title: Never Again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotwired this room to fly out of JFK in the am. Wasn't expecting the Ritz Carlton but I wasn't expecting a seedy, rent by the hour, filthy, digusting dump either. Do not believe any of the reviews that say this place is clean..........there wasn't a clean thing about this place. Some examples, the air conditioner smelled like it had be urinated on and the sitting chair in the room was stained with, well who knows. The carpets were filthy and full of cigarrette burns and NYC has been non-smoking for how long? We were afraid to touch anything and couldn't wait to check out in the am. Had it not been in such a sketchy neighborhood, I would have slept in my car.
reviews.title: Nightmare!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I went to celebrate our anniversary over a 3 day weekend. I reserved the jacuzzi suite. It sounded nice and the pictures were nice. The suite overlooked a great gas station and the jacuzzi that I paid an extra $60 for only had 2 out of 6 jets working. Was not pleased.
reviews.title: Not what I expected

reviews.text: Stayed there for 6 nights. Staffs are friendly. Room was clean. Good room service. Great location. Close to Metro. Safe. Parking is not adequate. Breakfast selection was good.
reviews.title: Nice stay

reviews.text: Room was clean. Toilet was clean and nice. Will stay again.
reviews.title: Pleasant surprise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: unplanned reroute thru JFK last year snowstorm.Fast shuttle at 1 am.Nicest guy on planet.
reviews.title: Sleep with one eye open!!
